text: Miroslav Stepan (5 August 1945 - 23 March 2014) was a former Czechoslovakian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia. He was the Secretary of the Municipal Party Committee in Prague and member of the Czech national Council and House of People Federal Assembly. He was born in Louney. Štěpán died on 23 March 2014 from cancer in Prague, aged 68.Communist Miroslav Štěpán dies at Novinky.cz ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Czechoslovak communist politicians
title: Miroslav Štěpán
